Eaten by Monsters music blog

http://eatenbymonsters.com An award-winning, taste-making, discourse-shaping powerhouse (albeit in a very specific niche).
Eaten by Monsters music blog

Running EbM has opened the door to a host of opportunities; writing for Tom Robinson's Fresh On The Net blog, learning all about web publishing the hard way, and (most importantly) getting me on the press-lists for all my favourite record labels.

Cassette Script Typeface

More examples of my work:

  • Atlantic Brewery A responsive e-commerce site for one Cornwall's best craft-beer brewers.
  • Fairgrieve & Horner records A fully responsive custom Wordpress theme for a boutique record label.
  • CSS and Javascript Keyboard A working piano keyboard built using the Web Audio API and styled with CSS.
  • E.C. Dawson & Company A dynamic band site with Twitter and Soundcloud integration.
  • Cassette Script Typeface Cassette Script is a quirky handwriting font with over 200 characters.
